sentences.en: A hyperbola approaches but does not meet its asymptote.
sentences.cn: 双曲线逐渐接近它的渐近线但不相交.

sentences.en: According to the relationship between hyperbola and its normal, the analytic equation is discussed.
sentences.cn: 根据双曲线与其法线的几何特征关系建立了求解法线的解析方程,分析了法线问题解析求解的繁杂性.

sentences.en: Another is to intenerate the input vectors by hyperbola tangent function.
sentences.cn: 二是采用双曲线正切函数柔化输入矢量.

sentences.en: Construct hyperbola and the ellipse by taking the inversion.
sentences.cn: [利用反逆法作双曲线及椭圆].

sentences.en: I should be looking only on the hyperbola.
sentences.cn: 我应该只看双曲线上的点就足够了。

sentences.en: If you look at this point where the hyperbola and the circle touch each other, first of all, I don't know which circle I am going to look at.
sentences.cn: 来看一下这一点,这里双曲线和圆刚好接触的地方，首先，我不知道我要看的是圆上面的哪一点。

sentences.en: The demand curve is thus an equilateral hyperbola.
sentences.cn: 因此需求曲线是等轴双曲线.

sentences.en: The departure leg would be the mirror image of the inbound path ( a hyperbola or parabola ).
sentences.cn: 离开的路径会是进来路径的镜像,呈现双曲线或是 抛物线 的图形.

sentences.en: The duncan - Zhang E - B hyperbola model includes seven parameters.
sentences.cn: Duncan-Zhang的E -B 双曲线模型共有7个参数,依据试验数据并按比例分别增减每个参数.

sentences.en: The method uses small random samples and the limits of a hyperbola.
sentences.cn: 帕克斯顿的方法采用了小范围随机抽样和双曲线的极限.

sentences.en: The relation between the chlorinity and porosity may be approximated by a hyperbola.
sentences.cn: 含氯量和孔隙度之间的关系图式也许近似于一条双曲线.

sentences.en: Yes, we can still find points on the hyperbola and so on.
sentences.cn: 我们仍然可以在双曲线上找到解。

trans.tran_en: a conic section formed by a plane that cuts both bases of a cone; it consists of two branches asymptotic to two intersecting fixed lines and has two foci
